conbody.p: When you have successfully deployed following the instructions in the Deployment Guide, you have access to the administration portal and a command line tool. For a description on how to access the available tools, refer to .

In order for a supplier to be able to define price models and for the rating and billing engine of to be able to calculate usage costs, you need to add one or several currencies to the system. For details, refer to .

In the next step, you create technology provider and seller organizations (suppliers, resellers, brokers), and set up marketplaces so that services can be offered to customers. For details, refer to and .
